thread.title: Vehicle hits high school band at Alabama Mardi Gras | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Vehicle hits high school band at Alabama Mardi Gras | Daily Mail Online

author: James Wilkinson For Dailymail.Com
title: Vehicle hits high school band at Alabama Mardi Gras | Daily Mail Online
text: BREAKING: Military Officer's Association SUV ends up ON TOP of high school band on Alabama Mardi Gras parade route, injuring 12 children aged 12-17, with four critically hurt The car was following the band on the route when it slammed into the teenagers It was being driven by a 73-year-old male from Fairhope, officials said All of the victims have been hospitalized. The man is in police custody Military Officer's Association of America confirmed SUV was representing them Police may press charges but say they don't believe there was criminal intent They also turned down an offer from the FBI to investigate the tragic crash It's not known whether drugs or alcohol were a factor Published: 17:36 GMT, 28 February 2017 | Updated: 18:47 GMT, 28 February 2017 198 shares
